price: ከኑሕም በኋላ ከክፍለ ዘመናት ሰዎች ያጠፋናቸው ስንትና ስንት (ብዙዎች) ናቸው፡፡ የባሮቹንም ኃጢኣቶች ውስጠ ዐዋቂ ተመልካች መኾን በጌታህ በቃ፡፡
arabic: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ نُوحٖۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرَۢا بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakam ahlaknā mina al-qurūni min baʿdi nūḥin wakafā birabbika bidhunūbi ʿibādihi khabīran baṣīran
